name: Nevultra
description:
HELP NINA!


After the great devastation, Nina abandons her system and tries to reach the promised land she heard about, in deep space. It's your mission to help her!

EXCITING LOW-RESOLUTION SHOOTER


This exciting shooter will take you back to the 8bit/16bit era. Written in C++ for supreme performance, retro gaming fanatics are going to have a blast trying to achieve the highest score.

FEATURES

  • Steam achievements
  • Steam leaderboard
  • Vicious bosses
  • A diverse selection of weapons
  • A specific scoring system
